Welcome to XrmWebTools!

This Chrome extension provides a few XTB tools that are converted to a simplified WEB Version.

Features:
* Audits Today
* Audit Advanced Find
* Audit Center
* Plugin Trace viewer
* Users Last Login
* Load Online Users

More information can be found on https://github.com/XrmWebTools
